mapper.select: SELECT decompose_details_snapshot_id, target_decompose_history_id, employee_id, area_id, department_id, product_id, region_id, industry_id, principal_employee_id, amount_target, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM decompose_details_snapshot WHERE decompose_details_snapshot_id = #{decomposeDetailsSnapshotId} and delete_flag = 0

SELECT td.decompose_target, tds.decompose_details_snapshot_id, tds.target_decompose_history_id, tds.employee_id, e.employee_name, tds.area_id, a.area_name, tds.department_id, d.department_name, tds.product_id, p.product_name, tds.region_id, r.region_name, tds.industry_id, isy.industry_name, tds.principal_employee_id, e2.employee_name as principal_employee_name, tds.amount_target, tds.delete_flag, tds.create_by, tds.create_time, tds.update_by, tds.update_time FROM decompose_details_snapshot tds left join target_decompose_history tes on tes.target_decompose_history_id = tds.target_decompose_history_id and tes.delete_flag = 0 left join target_decompose td on td.target_decompose_id = tes.target_decompose_id and td.delete_flag = 0 left join `system-manage`.employee e on e.employee_id=tds.employee_id and e.delete_flag = 0 left join area a on tds.area_id = a.area_id and a.delete_flag = 0 left join `system-manage`.department d on d.department_id = tds.department_id and d.delete_flag=0 left join product p on tds.product_id = p.product_id and p.delete_flag=0 left join `system-manage`.region r on r.region_id = tds.region_id and r.delete_flag = 0 left join `system-manage`.industry isy on isy.industry_id=tds.industry_id and isy.delete_flag=0 left join `system-manage`.employee e2 on e2.employee_id=tds.principal_employee_id and e2.delete_flag = 0 WHERE tds.target_decompose_history_id = #{targetDecomposeHistoryId} and tds.delete_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO decompose_details_snapshot (target_decompose_history_id, employee_id, area_id, department_id, product_id, region_id, industry_id, principal_employee_id, amount_target, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.targetDecomposeHistoryId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.employeeId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.areaId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.departmentId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.productId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.regionId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.industryId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.principalEmployeeId}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.amountTarget}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.deleteFlag}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.createBy}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.createTime}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.updateBy}, #{decomposeDetailsSnapshot.updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE decompose_details_snapshot SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE decompose_details_snapshot_id IN
#{item}

UPDATE decompose_details_snapshot SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE target_decompose_history_id IN
#{item}
